person.persName: Samuel D. Everett, Jr. (Montgomery County, Kentucky, farmer and provisional government convention member.)

body.p: Montgomery County, Kentucky, farmer and provisional government convention member. Son of Samuel D. Everett, Sr. and Henrietta Everett. Student in Montgomery County in 1850. Farmer in Montgomery County in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in Montgomery County in 1860. Member of the convention of the provisional government held at Russellville in November 1861.
